data.title: The Ultimate Test
data.solution:
l={0=>'',1=>'+',2=>'-'}
n=gets.chomp
mindex = 3**(n.size-1)
t=gets.to_i
for i in 0...mindex
ops=(0...n.size-1).map{|j|l[i/(3**j)%3]}.reverse
expr = ([n.chars]+[ops+['']]).transpose.join
if eval(expr)==t
puts expr
end
end
data.statement:
Write a program that outputs all possibilities to put + or - or nothing between the digits of a number N such that the result is K(a number). 

For an example N = 123456789 and K = 100

Explanation : 1 + 2 + 3 - 4 + 5 + 6 + 78 + 9 = 100.
(This is just 1 case you are supposed to find all of them).

NOTE  :  When there is nothing between the numbers they get appended.
NOTE  :  The order of the digits should not be changed.
NOTE  :  Ordering priority is nothing > + > - .
NOTE :   There is no 0 involved in N.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:string(100)
read K:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
LINE 1: Number N.
LINE 2:  K (Target Number).
data.outputDescription: Lines containing each expression that equals the target number.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
The Goal

Write a program that outputs all possibilities to put + or - or nothing between the digits of a number N such that the result is K(a number).

For an example N = 123456789 and K = 100

Explanation : 1 + 2 + 3 - 4 + 5 + 6 + 78 + 9 = 100.
(This is just 1 case you are supposed to find all of them).

NOTE : When there is nothing between the numbers they get appended.
NOTE : The order of the digits should not be changed.
NOTE : Ordering priority is nothing > + > - .
NOTE : There is no 0 involved in N.
Input
LINE 1: Number N.
LINE 2: K (Target Number).
Output
Lines containing each expression that equals the target number.
Constraints
1 <= N <= 10^10
1 <= K <= 10^8
Example
Input
123
6
Output
1+2+3
